hero.name: Julia Paier
hero.desc: I build clean, usable interfaces with a focus on structure, clarity, and thoughtful interaction.

quote: Living in discovery is at all times preferable to living through assumptions.

work.title: Selected Work
work.intro: A few projects that show how I think, design, and build.

contact.title: Contact
contact.intro: If you'd like to collaborate or have a question, feel free to reach out.

memory-game.title: Memory Game
memory-game.description: A browser-based memory game focused on clarity, feedback, and accessibility.
memory-game.overview: I built a fast, accessible memory game with a strong focus on interaction feedback and clean structure.
details: Designed a clear and readable UI.

swiftui-habit-tracker.title: SwiftUI Habit Tracker
swiftui-habit-tracker.description: A calm mood and habit tracking app built with SwiftUI.
swiftui-habit-tracker.overview: This project explores how small daily habits can be tracked in a simple, non-intrusive way.
details: Designed a minimal and calm UI.
Explored SwiftUI navigation and state handling.
